name: Crazy Smash Hit
description:
This is a game which you can play from the first person perspective by hitting the obstacles to display your power of reflexes and ability to hit accurately while increasing your score to top.

Show your abilities!
Crazy Smash Hit lets you to show your abilities, use your reflexes and move forward to increase your score without hitting obstacles in front of you. While moving forward you will have a first person perspective inside corridors. You should hit the obstacles and collect the balls while the game is getting harder and harder, those balls are necessary to move forward in levels so please be careful while using your balls.Crazy Smash Hit is a game which you demonstrate your capabilities, intelligence and reflexes, so smash obstacles now. Good Luck!

Game Properties
* It is designed as  infinite through its dynamic levels with more than 20 different blocks.
* Dynamic  interface transitions
* Turkish and English language support
* Musics and vivacious game sounds composed by Ferdi Aşık
* Ability to share your scores by means of GooglePlay
